verbose_text: The results showed that local administration of curcumin in knee joints markedly repressed the LPS induced IL-1beta and TNF-a secretion from synovium, inhibited the LPS induced overexpression of TLR4 and its downstream NF-kappaB in cartilage and synovium tissues, ameliorated the LPS aggravated cartilage lesion, matrix degradation, chondrocyte apoptosis and synovial inflammation.
